TopicTitle: new KSP player enjoying this game a lot!

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

My name is Tim, I'm 21 years old and from the Netherlands.

I've been playing KSP for about 2 weeks now and i'm enjoying it a lot! It took me some time to get the mechanics down but i've finally set foot on the mun.

Even though my kerbal can't get back to his home planet I'm sure he's having fun out there.
